name: Factory Panic [LDjam42]
description:
An atempt of making a game for LDjam 42 (72h). I recommend Chrome for best performence!

How To Play:

  • Move: Up/Down arrows
  • Steer: Left/Right arrows
  • Hold: Space

A little behind the scenes info:

Had not 100% time to spend on the game but I did what I could.  Unity refused to work so I made the game in JS(JavaScript) completly, much because I have worked a lot in JS lately but not for gamedev before.

I will most likely continue working on this game for a little while, at least so it becomes like a playable game.
